translation: Entering into demoniacal wombs and deluded, birth after birth, they do not attain Me, thus falling, O Arjuna, into a condition still lower than that.
commentary: 16.20 Asura demoniacal? vaginal womb? Apannaá¸¥ entering into? Fools deluded? Birth after birth in birth after birth? Maam Me? unattainable not attaining? Eve still? Kaunteya O son of Kunti (Arjuna)? Then than that? Yanti (they) fall into? lower lower? gatim condition (path or goal).Commentary These degraded Asuras are cast into the demoniacal wombs. They are reduced to the very lowest condition or the most
